package.description: This package contains Gazebo, from the Player Project (http://playerstage.sf.net). This package does not modify Gazebo in any way; it simply provides a convenient way to download and compile the headers and libraries in a way that can be managed by the ROS dependency system.
package.author: Nate Koenig, Andrew Howard, with contributions from many others. See web page for a full credits llist.
